MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Borough Grove and surrounding streets We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:16pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55pm on 29th January 2021.
